title: Dutch Oven Southwestern Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) diced tomatoes with green chiles
1 package (8.5 oz) dry corn muffin mix
instructions: Preheat oven to 200 degrees C (400 degrees F). Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat. Add diced chicken and cook until no longer pink, about 5-7 minutes. Add diced carrots, celery, bell pepper, and scallions; cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in diced tomatoes with green chiles, black beans, chili powder, cumin, granulated garlic, onion powder, smoked paprika, salt, and black pepper. Cook until heated through, about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, combine corn muffin mix with milk and egg in a bowl. Remove Dutch oven from heat and spread cornbread batter over chicken mixture. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes until cornbread is golden and beginning to brown.
